patterns.name: keyword.control.mbdyn

patterns.name: storage.type.struct.mbdyn
patterns.match: \b(output results|reference|constitutive law|c81 data|drive caller|template drive caller|module load|setenv|hydraulic fluid|initial time|final time|strategy|min time step|max time step|time step|tolerance|max iterations|method|eigenanalysis|structural|asbtract|electric|hydraulic|parameter|output|file|aerodynamic body|aerodynamic beam2|aerodynamic beam3|aeromodal|aircraft instruments|air properties|generic aerodynamic force|induced velocity|automatic structural|beam3|beam2|body|bulk|electric|force|couple|genel|gravity|hydraulic|joint regularization|joint|stream output|set|beam|driven|derivatives coefficient|derivatives max iterations|derivatives tolerance|abstract|abstract node|structural node|rigid bodies|problem|inertia|include|print|nonlinear solver|linear solver|aerodynamic element|integrator|rotor)s?(?=\s*[:;])
